column1: "There's something I need to get off my chest."
"Well, this is where I live."
"I've been waiting a long time for you."
"I just want a nice, easy life. What's wrong with that?"
"Spare some coins, please?"
"You don't scare me."
"Have you eaten anything today?"
"We could leave, you know. Go far away."
"Is that blood? Is it yours?"
"Alcohol isn't going to solve your problems."
"I see you don't recognize me. Well, it was a long time ago."
"Can I come with you?"
"For some reason, I'm attracted to you."
"Will you stay with me? Just for tonight."
"Can I help you?"
"Every great journey begins with a single footstep."
"There's a reason I keep this door closed."
"I don't feel so good."
"What exactly do you do for a living?"
"I've got to get home, it's getting late."
"I have a wide selection of weapons for you to choose from."
. "I'm confident you won't find a better selection of goods than what I have here."
"Seen something you like? Make me an offer and we'll see what we can do."
"Fancy something special? I have a few unique items that might interest you."
"My prices may be a bit steep, but I assure you the quality of my wares is top-notch."
"Looking to stock up on supplies? I'm sure I have something that'll help you out."
"I'm sure I have something that can help you on your travels. Have a look around."
"I'm always getting new stock in, so be sure to check back soon!"
"I'm sure I have something you'll find useful, even if you don't know it yet."
"I'm sure you can handle it, but be careful out there."
"I bet if I could find enough dragon dung, I'd be quite wealthy!"
"My wares are the finest in the land. What do you seek?"
"Here you'll find the finest in armaments and supplies. What do you need?"
"What do you seek? I have many fine items in stock."
"What brings you to my shop?"
"I specialize in the finest quality goods. What do you seek?"
"Let me tell you a bit about this item. It's one of a kind and very rare."
"Take a look around. I'm sure you'll find something of interest."
"I'm sure you won't find this anywhere else."
"It's a great bargain, so why not take it off my hands?"
"I can give you a good deal if you buy it now."
"This is a one time offer, so you better act fast!"
"I can make you an offer you can't refuse."
"I'm sure I can give you a better price than anyone else."
"This item is of the finest quality and worth every coin."
"You won't find anything else like it, so don't miss out!"
"If you're looking for something special, then this is it."
"I'm sure you'll find a use for it, so don't let it go to waste."
"It's a great investment and you won't regret it."
"Take it off my hands and you won't regret it."
